name: Commando Tactics
description:
Student game made by  a group of 2 first year students from a game programming school (Objectif 3D).
This project was made in one month without Graphist nor Game Designer, all sounds and graphics were found from free source on internet. The subject has been choosen from a list of 6 game genre (tactical, top view racing game, etc).

This is a turn based tactical game where you play a team of soldiers against another team of ennemy, there is a campaign mode and a versus mode (the two players play on the same computer one after another), each soldier has a speciality (medic, sniper, heavy weapon, "balanced")
